thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Lockheed Martin Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $4.02

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lockheed Martin Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $4.02
text:
Lockheed Martin Corp:
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $4.02 * Q1 SALES $11.6 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $11.24 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.40 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* UPDATES 2018 OUTLOOK FOR SALES, BUSINESS SEGMENT OPERATING PROFIT AND EARNINGS PER SHARE
* ACHIEVED QUARTER-END BACKLOG OF APPROXIMATELY $105 BILLION
* SEES 2018 NET SALES $50,350 MILLION $51,850 MILLION * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $15.59, REVENUE VIEW $51.05 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* INCREASE IN AERONAUTICS’ QTRLY NET SALES WAS PRIMARILY ATTRIBUTABLE TO HIGHER NET SALES OF ABOUT $185 MILLION FOR F-35 PROGRAM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
